testcase.name: Search for holiday packages
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage of Make My Trip website...........................passed When user selects Holiday Package option....................................passed And user enters the details.................................................passed And clicks on Search button.................................................passed Then relevant holiday packages matching search criteria are displayed.......passed

testcase.name: User applies filters to search Holiday Package
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Holiday Package page.......................................passed When user performed Holiday Package search..................................passed And user applies filters such as Duration, Hotel Category, Flights, Themes and Package Type.passed Then Relevant search results are displayed..................................passed

testcase.name: User sort holiday packages by price
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the MakeMyTrip holiday package search page.................passed When user clicks on sorted by dropdown......................................passed And choose to sort the holidays by Price-Low to High........................passed Then the holidays should be displayed in ascending order of price...........passed

testcase.name: User requests a callback using outline data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the MakeMyTrip Holiday Packages landing page...............passed When user clicks on the "Get a Call Back" widget............................passed And user fills in the callback form with name "John", phone "9876543210" and email "john@test.com".passed And user clicks on "Get a Call Back" button.................................passed And fills the another form by selecting preffered travel date, hotel star category, number of nights, No. of travellers and language preference.passed And clicks on Submit button.................................................passed Then the message "Thank you John " should be displayed after submitting.....passed

testcase.name: Hotel Category Filter with five star Selection
